headline: Netflix Stock Is Still a Hit on Wall Street After Earnings
summary: Netflix  stock is rebounding from a post-earnings drop as Wall Street analysts weigh in, positively, on what is next for the streaming platform.  While Netflix reported better-than-expected second-quarter earnings and offered upbeat forecasts for the current quarter on Thursday evening, the stock sold off on Friday because weakness in the U.S. dollar had boosted the results.  Several analysts remain optimistic that Netflix can continue to grow, with or without foreign-exchange tailwinds.
